title: Requiem For a Dream movie poster fonts
content:
Hi All

I'm looking for the font used in each of the attached for the "requiem for a dream" part - any help will be massively appreciated.

Cheers,  
Zak

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rfad3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043146/http:/typophile.com/files/rfad3.jpg) | 6.23 KB |
| [rfad2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043146/http:/typophile.com/files/rfad2.jpg) | 14.72 KB |
| [rfad1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043146/http:/typophile.com/files/rfad1.jpg) | 18.42 KB |
author: zakzek

comments.content:
Many many thanks marcox - that's a fantastic help.

Zak

I think rfad3 is [Times Bold SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043146/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/monotype_script_std_bold/?sample_text=Custom) (I don't think TNR has Bold SC).

- Mike Yanega
